recipe.ingredients: - dark chocolate (70% cocoa or higher): 100g - mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, sliced): 2 cups - Greek yogurt (unsweetened): 2 cups - honey: 2 tablespoons - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - mint leaves (for garnish): a few
recipe.directions: 1. Melt Chocolate: Break the dark chocolate into small pieces. Melt it in a microwave-safe bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring in between, or use a double boiler on the stove. 2. Prepare Berries: Wash and prepare the berries. Slice strawberries into smaller pieces to match the size of the other berries. 3. Mix Yogurt: In a separate bowl, combine Greek yogurt, honey, and vanilla extract. 4. Assemble Parfait: In serving glasses, layer the Greek yogurt mixture, a spoonful of melted dark chocolate, and then a layer of mixed berries. Repeat the layers until the glasses are filled. 5. Garnish and Serve: Garnish each parfait with mint leaves. Serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator for up to an hour before serving.
